Description: ITEM DETAILS: Epiphone E212T U.J. Sheraton Archtop Guitar in excellent condition. Very cool Union Jack finish with white binding and gold hardware and Frequensator tailpiece. The headstock has white/black/white binding and vine inlay. The rosewood fretboard has a binding inlay along with mother of pearl and abalone position markers. The guitar is set up with a nice action and the slim profile neck has a good feel. The frets are in excellent condition. Acoustically the guitar has great resonance. The Gibson USA mini-humbucker pickups and premium electronics have a great tone with good output. This is a guitar with special looks that plays and sounds great. Includes a nice gray Epiphone Hardshell Case. SHIPPING: Items ship to the USA only via USPS first class or priority mail. For heavier items I use FedEx shipping. Which is guaranteed the same amount of arrival which is about 2 to 5 business days. For FedEx items I cannot send to PO Box. Please message me if this is your only way of having item sent and maybe we can work something out. You may just have to pay a little extra for shipping. Not always the case though. Willing to accommodate for all my awesome and fast paying buyers! Orders over $350 come with signature confirmation. I love doing this as a courtesy for my customers. Should you message me and not want to have this service added to your shipping, please be aware that in the event that item gets lost we will not be held accountable. Same goes with an address change. Only PayPal and eBay approved addresses. We ship M-F only, so if you make a purchase on the weekend, it will not ship until Monday. All shipments include tracking. PAYMENT: Payments are accepted through Paypal only! RETURNS: If you are unhappy for any reason once the sale is complete, please contact me so that we can work out a resolution before leaving negative feedback. I always leave positive feedback for a buyer after they leave positive feedback for me. If there is an issue with your item contact me directly through eBay messages. I do accept returns for items that are NOT AS DESCRIBED or pictured, and I will pay for shipping, buyer has to pay for return shipping for any other reason. I try my best to always describe and provide as much details as I can about the items listed. Must be a valid reason for return. Returns because you changed your mind or didn't understand the listing will not be accepted. Always make sure to read everything about the condition and look at all the photos posted. 20% restock fee will be deducted from the refunded amount. I am always willing to work with my buyers. We take pride in our customer satisfaction and always strive to do so!  Thank you for looking
Title: Epiphone E212T U.J. Sheraton Archtop Guitar With Case Beautiful Condition !!
